member.name: P:Mersenne.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.summary: A random number generator With a uniform distribution Using the Mersenne Twister algorithm.

member.name: M:Mersenne.MersenneTwister.GenerateInt32(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a random Integer between 0 And maxValue. The maximum value. Must be greater than zero.

member.summary: Returns a number based on a gaussian curve Takes the mean and the STD
